Love the game! More needs to be added! Please make it so that you can interact with your wife and son! After you moved your family to the nice new house, they just sit there and watch TV. I would love to have some dialogue options with them. Add activities. Maybe you could choose to play ball with your son, or help your wife cook. Maybe some sort of affection meter can tell you how happy they are, so that you could balance your time between stealing and spending time with the family. That could be a nice challenge! Also, make the house bigger. If you are looking for options to expand the game, interacting with the family would keep the game going and never make me bored even if I completed the game. It would also humanize the thief even if he already provided the family the best living options.

title.label: Great potential and fun game... Needs a bit of work.

content.label:
I definitely remember when I saw this game, I thought it would indeed be a bootleg cash grab. But at that time, I just decided to do it, because why not? After a while of playing though, I found it to be really fun! It‚Äôs a rather interesting and strangely addictive game. It was already good originally; You were a random man who needs cash so you decide to rob places to get that cash while avoiding the police, upgrading your arsenal, and saving up for your dream home. But the updates definitely improved it. It tries its best to actually give the game a plot, and it surprisingly works! However, I will admit, during certain cutscenes (which I will not describe in detail because of potential spoilers.), the game can crash and refuse to continue. This is definitely inconvenient and results in a loss of data, especially if you just completed a big and successful heist. Maybe this could be fixed with an auto save feature before a cutscene? Overall however, it‚Äôs a rather good game. However it has amazing potential, and it needs a bit of work. Here‚Äôs a few things your developers can work on...

1. Grammar. I have seen many grammatical accidents, which is definitely an easy fix. This improvement is small, but could definitely increase your reputation.

2. Graphics. This is probably one of the most noticed flaws in the game. The character models can tend to look... a little jumpy. The animation quality can also be a little weird. This can definitely be improved however, and this can definitely improve your game AND businesses reputation, and net you more positive reviews. This can be done by enhancing character models, animation, and by changing the ‚Äúbuildings‚Äù to actual models.

3. Gameplay. Not necessarily change the game entirely, but just add some small gameplay aspects that would definitely challenge the players more. An example would be adding a timing challenge for lock picking. These small changes would definitely boost your reviews a bit!

And that‚Äôs about it. I definitely think adding these aspects into the game would improve it by quite a lot! Overall, the game is great and has a lot of potential. It just needs a bit of improvement, and it could be an amazing game!
